funding-source.institution: Forensic and Scientific Services Research and Development Project Grant

institution-wrap.institution: National Health and Medical Research Council

funding-group.funding-statement: This study was funded by an internal Forensic and Scientific Services research and development project grant (number RSS15-003). S. Ritchie is funded by National Health and Medical Research Council Senior Research Fellowship 1044698. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
